column.name: USER_LAYOUT_XML
column.value: <?xml version="1.0"?> <!DOCTYPE layout SYSTEM "file:/userLayout.dtd"> <layout> <folder ID="header01" priority="0" name="Header folder" type="header"> <channel ID="hchan00" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="true" removable="true" detachable="false" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CHeader" name="header"/> </folder> <folder ID="t01" priority="1" name="Main"> <folder ID="col01" priority="0" name="Column 1"> <channel ID="chan00" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="true" removable="false" detachable="false" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CLogin" name="Login"/> <channel ID="chan06" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CGenericXSLT" name="uPortal-Powered Sites"> <parameter value="http://www.interactivebusiness.com/publish/jasigPortalDemos.rss" name="xml"/> <parameter value="webpages/stylesheets/org/jasig/portal/channels/CGenericXSLT/RSS.ssl" name="ssl"/> </channel> </folder> <folder ID="col02" priority="0" name="Column 2"> <channel ID="chan38" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CInlineFrame" name="uPortal Home Page"> <parameter name="height" value="600" /> <parameter name="url" value="http://www.udel.edu/uPortal" /> </channel> </folder> </folder> <folder ID="t02" priority="0" name="Misc"> <folder ID="col03" priority="0" name="Column 1"> <channel ID="chan89" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CApplet" name="Minesweeper"> <parameter name="code" value="jmapplet.class"/> <parameter name="codeBase" value="http://www.nrr.co.uk/javamine/"/> <parameter name="width" value="152"/> <parameter name="height" value="195"/> <parameter name="archive" value="javamine.jar"/> <parameter name="APPLET.type" value="application/x-java-applet"/> <parameter name="APPLET.level" value="beginner"/> <parameter name="APPLET.rows" value="8"/> <parameter name="APPLET.cols" value="8"/> <parameter name="APPLET.mines" value="10"/> <parameter name="APPLET.marks" value="true"/> <parameter name="APPLET.graphics" value="true"/> </channel> </folder> <folder ID="col04" priority="0" name="Column 2"> <channel ID="chan11" priority="0" timeout="10000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CGenericXSLT" name="Word of the Day"> <parameter value="http://www.dictionary.com/wordoftheday/wotd.rss" name="xml"/> <parameter name="Column 1"> <channel ID="chan09" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CGenericXSLT" name="Salon.com"> <parameter value="http://www.salon.com/feed/RDF/salon_use.rdf" name="xml"/> <parameter value="webpages/stylesheets/org/jasig/portal/channels/CGenericXSLT/RSS.ssl" name="ssl"/> </channel> </folder> <folder ID="col06" priority="0" name="Column 2"> <channel ID="chan07" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="true" </folder> <folder ID="col02" priority="0" name="Column 1"> <channel ID="chan03" priority="0" timeout="5000" minimized="false" editable="true" hasHelp="true" removable="true" detachable="true" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CBookmarks" name="Bookmarks"/> </folder> </folder> <folder ID="t02" priority="0" name="Development"> <folder ID="col03" priority="0" name="Column 1"> <channel priority="0" timeout="10000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="false" detachable="false" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CSubscriber" name="Subscribe" fname="portal/subscribe/general"/> <channel ID="chan91" priority="0" timeout="10000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="false" detachable="false" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.CPublisher" name="Publish" fname="portal/publish/general"/> <channel ID="chan92" priority="0" timeout="10000" minimized="false" editable="false" hasHelp="false" removable="false" detachable="false" class="org.jasig.portal.channels.UserPreferences.CUserPreferences" name="User Preferences" fname="portal/userpreferences/general"/> </folder> </layout>

column.name: DESCR
column.value: RSS or Rich Site Summary, the most common channel format, is a channel which has its content defined through an XML document. Anyone may publish an RSS channel as long as the specification is adhered to and the file is stored on a publicly accessible web server. You will need to provide a URL for the RSS file.

column.name: DESCR
column.value: XSL renders XML to a particular style, is a channel which has its content defined through an XML document. Anyone may publish an XSL channel as long as the specification is adhered to and the file is stored on a publicly accessible web server. You will need to provide a URL or Path for the XML and XSL file.

column.name: DESCR
column.value: The Inline Frame channel can be used to render an HTML page within a frame. This channel does not work correctly in browsers older than Internet Explorer 5 and Netscape 6.

column.name: DESCR
column.value: Simple channel to display an image with optional caption and subcaption

column.name: USER_PREFERENCES_XML
column.value: <structurestylesheetuserpreferences> <parameters/> <folderattributes> <attribute name="width" defaultvalue="100%"> <folder folderid="col01" value="30%"/> <folder folderid="col02" value="70%"/> <folder folderid="col03" value="50%"/> <folder folderid="col04" value="50%"/> <folder folderid="col05" value="50%"/> <folder folderid="col06" value="50%"/> </attribute> </folderattributes> <channelattributes/> </structurestylesheetuserpreferences>

column.name: USER_PREFERENCES_XML
column.value: <themestylesheetuserpreferences> <parameters> <parameter name="activeTab">1</parameter> <parameter name="borderWidth">2</parameter> </parameters> <channelattributes> <attribute name="minimizable" defaultvalue="true"> <channel channelid="chan01" value="false"/> <channel channelid="chan02" value="false"/> </attribute> <attribute name="minimized" defaultvalue="false"> </attribute> </channelattributes> </themestylesheetuserpreferences>

column.name: USER_PREFERENCES_XML
column.value: <structurestylesheetuserpreferences> <parameters/> <folderattributes> <attribute name="width" defaultvalue="100%"> <folder folderid="col01" value="70%"/> <folder folderid="col02" value="30%"/> <folder folderid="col03" value="30%"/> <folder folderid="col04" value="70%"/> </attribute> </folderattributes> <channelattributes/> </structurestylesheetuserpreferences>

column.name: USER_PREFERENCES_XML
column.value: <themestylesheetuserpreferences> <parameters> <parameter name="activeTab">1</parameter> <parameter name="borderWidth">2</parameter> </parameters> <channelattributes> <attribute name="minimizable" defaultvalue="true"> <channel channelid="chan01" value="false"/> <channel channelid="chan02" value="false"/> </attribute> <attribute name="minimized" defaultvalue="false"/> </channelattributes> </themestylesheetuserpreferences>

column.name: STYLESHEET_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
column.value: Presents the layout in terms of tabs and columns.

column.name: STYLESHEET_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
column.value: Presents the layout in terms of nested categories.

column.name: STYLESHEET_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
column.value: Renders tabs and columns as nested tables

column.name: STYLESHEET_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
column.value: Renders tabs and columns as deck of cards

column.name: MIME_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
column.value: HTML mime type is the one that most desktop browsers use

column.name: MIME_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
column.value: WML mime type is mostly used by the cell phone WAP browsers.

column.name: BOOKMARK_XML
column.value: <?xml version="1.0"?> <bookmarks> <bookmark url="http://www.jasig.org" name="JA-SIG" comments="Java in Administration Special Interest Group"/> <bookmark url="http://www.interactivebusiness.com" name="IBS" comments="provides uPortal Services"/> <bookmark url="http://www.paypal.com" name="PayPal" comments="Send and receive money online!"/> <bookmark url="http://google.com" name="Google" comments="great search engine"/> </bookmarks>
